content: Dog-Friendly Space Finder
A mobile app that helps dog owners find dog-friendly parks or trails within their area
GPS-enabled search, filter by amenities (e.g. fenced areas, water fountains), reviews and ratings, option to save favorite spaces, in-app messaging for dog owners to connect
BringFido, Rover, BarkHappy, Pet Friendly Travel
The app is solely focused on finding dog-friendly spaces for dog owners, making the search process more efficient and targeted
Private Dog Park Rentals
Rent out private, fenced-in dog parks to dog owners who don't have access to public dog-friendly spaces
Online booking system, flexible hours of operation, options for daily or monthly rentals, park amenities (e.g. agility equipment, water features), waste disposal stations
Local public dog parks, dog daycare facilities
Provides a private and secure environment for dogs to play and exercise, without the risks associated with public spaces or other dogs
Virtual Dog Walking Tours
Guided virtual tours of dog-friendly parks or trails, allowing dog owners to explore and discover new areas from the comfort of their own home
Interactive map with highlighted routes, drone footage of the trails, voiceover narration with information on area history and attractions
Virtual tours of other tourist attractions or landmarks, such as museums or city highlights
Provides a solution for dog owners who are unable to physically visit new or unfamiliar dog-friendly spaces, expanding their options for dog walking
Dog-Friendly Rooftop Spaces
Rent out dog-friendly rooftops with a view for dog owners to use for dog walking or events
Online booking system, rooftop amenities (e.g. seating areas, play equipment), waste disposal stations, flexible hours of operation
Rooftop bars or restaurants, public parks
Provides a unique and enjoyable environment for dogs to walk and get some exercise, while also offering views and experiences that public spaces cannot
pain_point_description: owners in urban areas may struggle to find dog-friendly parks or trails, limiting where they can walk their pet
